__e: Dr. Einstein, my name is Alice Edwards and, well, you are the smartest man in history, sir, all the papers say so, and all that stuff you said about the universe and whatnot?
He came by to see me and he borrowed my phone and my car, but he was acting really weird when we went to see Dr. Edwards and he just ran out.
And I'm sure the Pinkertons and Mr. Edwards have made life somewhat more difficult for you as well.
